todo
Description

externals

string regex function array object

Prevent bundling of certain imported packages and instead retrieve these external packages at runtime. For example, to include jQuery from a CDN instead of bundling it:

index.html

...
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.1.0.js"
  integrity="sha256-slogkvB1K3VOkzAI8QITxV3VzpOnkeNVsKvtkYLMjfk="
  crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
...

webpack.config.js

externals: {
  jquery: 'jQuery'
}

This leaves any dependant modules unchanged, i.e. the code shown below will still work:

import $ from 'jquery';

$('.my-element').animate(...);
